extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordGrid()
      Default constructor.
      WordGrid(int rows, int cols)
      Initialize the word search with the specified number of rows and columns.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Attempts to add a given word diagonally down and left at the specified row and column.

      Attempts to add a given word diagonally down and right at the specified row and column.

      Attempts to add a given word diagonally up and left at the specified row and column.

      Attempts to add a given word diagonally up and right at the specified row and column.

      Attempts to add a given word horizontally at the specified row and column.

      Attempts to add a given word vertically at the specified row and column.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WordGrid

        public WordGrid()
        Default constructor. Initializes the word search array with a height and width of 10.

      • WordGrid

        public WordGrid(int rows,
        int cols)
        Initialize the word search with the specified number of rows and columns.
        Parameters:
        rows - The number of rows (height) of the array.
        cols - The number of columns (width) of the array.

      • addWordHorizontal

        public boolean addWordHorizontal(java.lang.String word,
                        int row,
                        int col)
        Attempts to add a given word horizontally at the specified row and column.
        Parameters:
        word - A specified word.
        row - The vertical location to add the word at.
        col - The horizontal location to add the word at.
        Returns:
        true when the word is added successfully and false if the word cannot be added.
